name: Mermaid Stories: Book 1 - The Lost Gift
summary: Guide Maya the Mermaid as she helps her friend find a lost present. Explore the village and gather clues and items to help Maya find the location of the present and save the day. This is an easy-to-read and easy-to-play game designed for young players but can be enjoyed by all ages.
